alert.note: Alert for Cass; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 9:35PM EST until March 10 at 9:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Cass MI, Northern Berrien and Southern Berrien Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A mix of rain and snow is expected to change over to mainly snow by 11 PM EST. The heaviest snowfall is expected from midnight to 4 AM EST Friday morning when snowfall rates of one half inch to 1 inch per hour are possible at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
